#summary LSM API getting started.

= Introduction =

The following example illustrates how to use lsm java API a class for adding, deleting and updating GSN sensor data to LSM triple store

= Details =

Required Java version: Java SE 1.7

Required Java libraries:

- [http://deri-lsm.googlecode.com/files/lsmlibs.jar lsmlibs]

- [http://sourceforge.net/projects/dom4j/ dom4j]
